Apple___Apple_scab: Apply 50 kg FYM per tree and use balanced NPK (10:26:26).
Apple___Black_rot: Spray potash-rich fertilizer and add composted manure.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust: Use phosphorus-based fertilizer and maintain soil pH.
Apple___healthy: Apply 70 g urea + 350 g superphosphate per tree.
Blueberry___healthy: Use ammonium sulfate or urea, avoid lime-rich soil.
Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy: Use potassium sulfate fertilizer for fruit quality.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_: Use nitrogen-based urea and potash fertilizer.
Corn_(maize)___healthy: Apply 100 kg urea + 50 kg potash per acre.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo: Apply foliar zinc and boron spray.
Grape___healthy: Add 60 kg FYM per vine annually.
Peach___Bacterial_spot: Apply balanced NPK and avoid excess nitrogen.
Pepper,_bell___healthy: Use urea + DAP for healthy growth.
Potato___Early_blight: Apply NPK (10:26:26) + gypsum for soil balance.
Potato___Late_blight: Use DAP + potash fertilizer before tuber formation.
Potato___healthy: Apply 50 kg urea + 40 kg potash per acre.
Raspberry___healthy: Use compost manure and potassium fertilizer.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch: Apply foliar spray of calcium nitrate.
Tomato___Target_Spot: Use balanced NPK + foliar potassium nitrate.
